Refraction

Boosts the power of Beam-type moves.

Affected Moves

The following moves are affected by this ability.

Name Type Category PP Power Accuracy Description
Aurora Beam 20 65 100 The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam that may also lower its Attack stat.
Bubble Beam 20 65 100 A spray of bubbles is ejected at the target. This may also lower its Speed stat.
Charge Beam 10 50 90 The target is hit by a charge. Remaining electricity may raise the user's Sp. Atk stat.
Concussive Blast 10 80 100 The user focuses force in a narrow beam. This move deals physical damage.
Eternabeam 5 160 90 Eternatus's original form's most powerful attack, but it can't move on the next turn.
Fickle Beam 5 80 100 Shoots a beam of light to inflict damage, sometimes doubling in power.
Hyper Beam 5 150 90 The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can't move on the next turn.
Ice Beam 10 90 100 The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy which may leave it with frostbite.
Meteor Beam 10 120 90 The user boosts its Sp. Atk stat, then attacks a target with space power on the next turn.
Moongeist Beam 5 100 100 The user emits a sinister ray that ignores Abilities to attack the target.
Psybeam 20 65 100 The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. This may also leave the target confused.
Signal Beam 15 75 100 The user attacks with a sinister beam of light. This may also confuse the target.
Simple Beam 15 — 100 The user's mysterious psychic wave changes the target's abilities to Simple.
Solar Beam 10 120 100 A two-turn attack. The user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.
Steel Beam 5 140 95 The user fires a beam of steel from its entire body. This also damages the user.
Twin Beam 10 40 100 The user shoots mystical beams from its eyes. It hits twice in a row.
